thread.title: Idesco To Showcase The Latest ID Card Solutions At The BizBash Live New York Expo
thread.title_full: Idesco To Showcase The Latest ID Card Solutions At The BizBash Live New York Expo

title: Idesco To Showcase The Latest ID Card Solutions At The BizBash Live New York Expo
text: Idesco To Showcase The Latest ID Card Solutions At The BizBash Live New York Expo September 22, 2015 -- New York, NY (PRWEB) September 22, 2015 Idesco Corp. , a leading New York-based security systems integrator, today announced it will be exhibiting at the BizBash Live New York Expo , the premier trade show and conference for the event industry. The show will take place on October 27, 2015 from 10:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. at the Jacob K. Javits Convention Center in New York, NY. The BizBash Live New York Expo is a unique opportunity for over 2,000 event and meeting planners to gain access to the latest event solutions. Idesco will be at booth #206 showcasing its innovative ID card solutions, including the neXus ID printers for oversized event badges. Event planners will have the opportunity to see first hand how to improve safety at their next event with Idescos one-of-a-kind oversized card printers. Idesco is the exclusive reseller in the U.S. of the neXus XXL 2.0 and the neXus XCR100 .0 ID card printers. The neXus XXL 2.0 ID card printer has been designed to personalize oversized event badges on demand. It features a Plug & Play driver for Windows and Mac, standard USB, a convenient display and a 2-year warranty. The neXus XCR100 2.0 ID card printer is the only printer on the market that can personalize CR100 cards (3.88 x 2.63). Easy to spot from a distance and too big to hide in a wallet, CR100 cards are 42% larger than the standard credit card size. We are excited to demonstrate our innovative and durable ID card solutions to event specialists, says Andrew Schonzeit, President of Idesco. As a leading provider of security solutions, we understand the challenges that event and meeting planners face on a regular basis. Our goal is to help them issue professional badges to secure their venue and keep everyone safe and secure. For more information, visit http://www.idesco.com/events/ or call 212-889-2530. About Idesco Corp. Idesco has been leading the security industry for over 7 decades and offers a full range of security products including, digital ID badging systems, access control, biometrics, turnstiles, visitor management, and digital video surveillance. Idesco started as a pioneer in ID Badging, and has evolved into a full-service security systems integrator that designs and manages high-scale system installations in major universities, television networks, and large municipalities. For further information, please visit http://www.idesco.com . PR Contact: Infusion Direct Marketing & Advertising, Inc. 631-846-1558
